about_the_game:
It will have 6 musical themes. These themes are completely customized for the game, enveloping the game environment with different rhythms of heavy music that combine orchestral passages with lead instruments that convey a very strong identity.
We invite you to download Dome Discover and its OST.


Do not forget to follow Blackparabyte in all its social networks and meeting points where we will be uploading the progress including new songs and some making of the music creation for the game.

name: Dome Discover Soundtrack
